fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Competition, Business and Industry, Environment, Food Safety
eu_initiatives:
The Welfare Quality Network is a collaborative effort of a large group of former partners of the Welfare Quality® project. The importance of retaining the collaboration and expertise established in the Welfare Quality® project has been highlighted in numerous official communications. 
 
 The Welfare Quality Network focuses on scientific exchange and activities to contribute to the further development of the Welfare Quality® animal welfare assessment systems. The Welfare Quality Network also aims to provide relevant knowledge for animal welfare policy and legislation and supports actors in animal production chains who would like to implement or use the Welfare Quality® animal welfare assessment systems.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
relevant_communication: Provision and publication of scientific knowledge on the assessment and possible improvement of animal welfare. Members in the network publish their studies in scientific papers and at conferences
goals__remit: The Welfare Quality Network focuses on scientific exchange and activities to contribute to the further development and implementation of the Welfare Quality® animal welfare assessment systems. The Network also aims to provide relevant knowledge and services to support actors in animal production chains who would like to implement or use the Welfare Quality® animal welfare assessment systems.
